title: Drawing, "Desk: Seating at Center, Center Drawer, Filing Cabinet-Left and Right", 1930s
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions in graphite throughout. Inscribed instructions in graphite within design outlines. Inscribed in graphite: at lower left, NOTE/ DESK TO BE BUIILT AS A SHELL TO SLIP/ OVER  TWO STOCK SIZE FILING CABINETS; at lower right, NO BOTTOM IN SIDE COMPARTMENTS OF DESK; in lower left hand corner, P; in lower right hand corner, [Deskey #] 8058. Inscribed in red colored pencil at lower right, P

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Desk: Seating at Center, Center Drawer, Filing Cabinet-Left and Right", 1930s.
1930s. Graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1769.
